metadata.synopsis: A sharran cultist reacting to the aftermath of Viconia's defeat in the sharran grotto.

0.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
0.text: We did well. Lady Shar will smile upon us.
0.context: NodeContext: Proud. Speaking out loud to anyone who cares to listen in the aftermath of a successful coup against the (now former) leader of the sharran cult. This character was one of the first to change sides, and now feels vindicated/satisfied.

1.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
1.text: I felt it in my very marrow - our future lies with Shadowheart.
1.context: NodeContext: Proud. Speaking out loud to anyone who cares to listen in the aftermath of a successful coup against the (now former) leader of the sharran cult. This character was one of the first to change sides, and now feels vindicated/satisfied.

2.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
2.text: But now she is gone, and we remain. Lady Shar's bidding shall be done.
2.context: NodeContext: Proud. Speaking out loud to anyone who cares to listen in the aftermath of a successful coup against the (now former) leader of the sharran cult. This character was one of the first to change sides, and now feels vindicated/satisfied.

3.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
3.text: The Mother Superior succumbed to her own ambitions. She strayed from Lady Shar's embrace.
